Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision to assign a worker to a specific team

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a feature in the next release plan

Name: allocate_story_points
Description: Number of story points to assign to a user story

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in days

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific task to a specific worker

Name: team_size_target
Description: The target size for a team

Name: prioritize_epic
Description: Numerical priority level assigned to an epic

Name: budget_allocated_to_feature
Description: Amount of budget allocated to develop a specific feature

Name: select_retrospective_action
Description: Binary decision to implement an improvement action from a retrospective

Name: number_of_sprints
Description: Total number of sprints planned for the project
